mapper.select: SELECT R.BOARD_REVIEW_NUMBER,R.BOARD_REVIEW_MEMBER_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME,R.BOARD_REVIEW_SCORE,R.BOARD_REVIEW_DATE, R.BOARD_REVIEW_CONTENT, R.BOARD_REVIEW_Img, R.BOARD_REVIEW_Imgpath, R.BOARD_REVIEW_Thumbnail FROM PRODUCT P, BOARD_REVIEW R WHERE R.BOARD_REVIEW_PRODUCT_CODE = P.PRODUCT_CODE

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_TEL, M.MEMBER_REGDATE, A.AUTHORITIES_MEMBER, A.AUTHORITIES_MANAGER, A.AUTHORITIES_ADMIN FROM MEMBER M,AUTHORITIES A WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = A.AUTHORITIES_MEMBER_ID
select * from product,stock where product.product_code = stock.stock_product_code and product.product_code = #{productCode}
